```{r Hochladen der Listen des Netzwerks}

library(igraph)
# load raw edges data ----
edgelist <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/weisse-rose/Weisse-Rose/master/edgelist.csv",header = TRUE, sep = ',', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# load raw nodes data ----
nodelist <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/weisse-rose/Weisse-Rose/master/nodelist.csv",header = TRUE, sep = ',', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# create network ----
edges <-  as.matrix(edgelist)
nodes <- as.matrix(nodelist)
wr <-  graph_from_data_frame(d=edges, directed=F)
plot(wr)
```

```{r Auswahl Edge-Attribute}
edge.attributes(wr)$relationship
edge.attributes(wr)$time
```

```{r Visualisierung nach Attribut time}
# setzt den Wert rot fÃ¼r alle Werte 1 = vor Flugblatt 1

E(wr)[E(wr)$time!=1]$color<-"black"
```
